articles.title: University of Michigan Hires Santa Ono as New President - The New York Times
articles.description: Santa J. Ono will be the university’s first Asian American president. He will take the helm during a contentious time in higher education.
articles.content: Known in scientific circles primarily for his work involving the immune system and diseases of the eye, Dr. Ono also has a more playful side. He has been known to dress up in a Santa Claus costume, a… [+999 chars]

articles.title: Monkeybox reaches community spread level in Austin, Texas - Austin American-Statesman

articles.content:
Monkeypox in Travis County has now reached the level of community spread, local public health officials said Wednesday.

articles.title: Regional manufacturing of vaccines to bolster pandemic preparedness in the Americas - Pan American Health Organization
articles.description: With Omicron variant sub-lineages BA.4 and BA.5 driving most new COVID-19 infections, and other diseases likely to emerge in the future, increased medical production is key to saving lives, PAHO Director says.
